channel.title: Comments on: The Big Lebowski
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Smarty
item.dc:creator: Smarty
item.description:
I find it a little baffling that "The Big Lebowski" has such a huge following. I enjoyed it when I saw it, but I don't think I'm the target audience. It's a male-bonding/drug-appreciation movie.
(That said, I love Steve Buscemi!)
item.content:encoded:
I find it a little baffling that “The Big Lebowski” has such a huge following. I enjoyed it when I saw it, but I don’t think I’m the target audience. It’s a male-bonding/drug-appreciation movie.

(That said, I love Steve Buscemi!)
